description: This file defines a Next.js page component for displaying detailed information about a recipe, including static path generation, data fetching via mock data, and rendering of recipe details such as image, title, description, steps, ingredients, and tags.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Provides the list of pre-rendered recipe IDs for static generation.

methods.name: RecipeDetailPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the recipe detail page based on route parameters.
